label: 秀才
本: Sugawara no Michizane and the Early Heian Court . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
説明文: One of the four civil service examinations.  Others were myōgyō (classics), shinshi (presented scholar"--the Chinese chin-shih), and myōbō (law).  The prestigious shūsai examination consisted of two essay questions requiring students to "summarize great matters" (p. 75). [明経、進士、明法] "
